DataElement.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Have Problems Attributed to Steroids Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of other problems they have noticed due to their treatment with steriods.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Have Problems Attributed to Steroids
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy._A question about whether an individual has or had other problems they attribute to their steroid use.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual has or had other problems they attribute to their steroid use.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had other problems they attribute to their steroid use.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study A221208 in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 1/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
